sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均可表示"在前的"之意。
means: previous ： 指时间上、顺序上较早的，或指正在谈论的某事的前一个。
foregoing ： 指前所述的，是following的反义词。
preceding ： 特指时间和地位上紧接在前。
prior与previous同义，常可换用，但prior有时强调更大的重要性，对比意味强。
former系latter的反义词，比prior更着重对比。

word_mean: 【修】主述，以[先]前，前(位)，前一(个，条，页…)

sentence.Network_en: Douglas was a 29-year-old journeyman fighter, erratic in his previous fights.
sentence.Network_cn: 道格拉斯29岁，是个技术不错的拳击手，在以前的比赛中发挥不太稳定。

sentence.Network_en: The man was known to the police because of previous convictions.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为有犯罪前科，警察们都认识这个人。

sentence.Network_en: CBS's ratings again showed huge improvement over the previous year.
sentence.Network_cn: 与前一年相比，哥伦比亚广播公司的收视率再次大幅提高。

lj.lj_ly: he seemed to have been in good health previous to the fatal injury.
lj.lj_ls: 受那场致命伤之前，他的身体状况似乎一直很好。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin praevius 'going before' (from prae 'before' + via 'way') + -ous

entry.def: A previous event or thing is one that happened or existed before the one that you are talking about.

example.ex: She has a teenage daughter from a previous marriage...
example.tran: 她前一段婚姻有一个十几岁的女儿。

entry.def: You refer to the period of time or the thing immediately before the one that you are talking about as the previous one.

example.ex: It was a surprisingly dry day after the rain of the previous week...
example.tran: 上星期刚下过雨，天气却出奇地干燥。

example.ex: He recalled exactly what Bob had told him the previous night.
example.tran: 他清楚记得前一天晚上鲍勃告诉他的话。

means.word_mean: 1. (used especially of persons) of the immediate past;

sentences.sentence: "our late President is still very active"
"the previous occupant of the White House"
"our condemnation of him was a bit previous"

means.word_mean: 3. just preceding something else in time or order;

auth_sentence.content: The previous website did this, and only this.
auth_sentence.res_content: The previous website did this, and only this.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The previous website did this, and only this.

auth_sentence.content: Previous field transmission trials used a single optical band.
auth_sentence.res_content: Previous field transmission trials used a single optical band.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Previous field transmission trials used a single optical band.

auth_sentence.content: No one in the group had previous heart problems.
auth_sentence.res_content: No one in the group had previous heart problems.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No one in the group had previous heart problems.

stems_affixes.word_buile: de离+vi道路+ous……的→偏离道路→不正直的,弯曲的
ob加强+vi道路+ous……的→就在路上→明显的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能被通过的,能透过去的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,穿过+vi道路+ous……的→道路穿过去的→能透过去的
pre预先,先前+vi路[引申为走]+ous……的→先走的,先前的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 琐细的, 价值不高的, 微不足道的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tri三+vi道路+al……的→三叉路上随处可见的→微不足道的
pervious[adj.能被通过的,能透过去的]+ness表名词→n.渗透[性];透[渗]水性
vect=vi道路+or→n.[数]向量, 矢量 v.无线电导引
ob倒,去掉+vi道路+ate表动词→从道路上去掉东西→排除障碍
vect=vi道路+or→n.[数]向量, 矢量 v.无线电导引
de离+vi道路+ate表动词→偏离道路,越轨

Sentence.sentence: When you purchase a used print book, it comes with its previous owner's highlights and notes in the margins.
their production capacity has shrunk to less than half of the previous year
This disparity (差异) suggests the memory of our previous meal may have a bigger influence on our appetite than the actual size of the meal.
It was better than the previous one.
Its findings are quite contrary to previous research.
For the first time in American history, there is the risk that the rising generation will be less well educated than the previous one.

sentences.en: The author mentioned it in the previous paragraph.
sentences.cn: 作者在前一段里提到这件事。

sentences.en: Don't be too previous about refusing.

jushi.english: A previous engagement prevents me from accepting your kind invitation.
jushi.chinese: 我因事前有了约会,不能接受您的盛情邀请。

jushi.english: The author mentioned it in the previous paragraph.
jushi.chinese: 作者在前一段里提到这件事。

jushi.english: He said he had arrived on the previous night.
jushi.chinese: 他说他是在前一天夜里到达的。
